page.title: 18SHOPPING
page.content: Longborough Post Office is the focal point for the area there being no other shop for 3 miles.As well as operating standard P.O.services it tends to sell a little of everything. The town of Moreton-in-Marsh is undoubtedly the number one shopping centre for the area in regard to food shopping.On Tuesdays the centre of the town is covered by a large market selling a host of commodities.The market bus is a useful service for the local residents.For electrical items, clothes & furniture a questionnaire revealed a complicated assembly of preferences although Cheltenham, Evesham, Stratford, Chipping Norton, Cirencester & Oxford were frequently mentioned.Most questioned did their shopping once a week & used the post office for emergency or forgotten items.
